dc:title:
From Union Square to Rome,
Chapter 11 - New Life
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of her final conversion after the birth of her daughter Theresa. She describes the struggle and anguish she felt while preparing for her and Theresa's Baptism--knowing her decision would end her relationship with her agnostic husband.
